item.title: Citi maintains its bullishness on cloud stock Snowflake ahead of second-quarter earnings
item.description: Citi sees another upside of 28% ahead for shares of Snowflake.

item.title: JPMorgan sees 50% upside ahead for China’s leading electric vertical aircraft manufacturer
item.description: JPMorgan cited EHang's first-mover advantage as a strong catalyst for shares.

item.title: Barclays upgrades this beauty stock to overweight on the back of its resistance to tariffs
item.description: Barclays analyst Adrienne Yih highlighted Ulta's relative resistance against tariffs and waning U.S. consumer demand.

item.title: Avoid these stocks that saw ‘double misses’ this earnings season, Wolfe Research warns
item.description: Potential sell candidates, according to the Wall Street researcher, include Southwest Airlines and Lockheed Martin.
